narrative.narrative: Air Mantra was a short lived airline based at Chandigarh,India. It started on July 23,2012 with two daily flights to Amritsar and suspended operations on March 31,2013. It failed due to poor booking numbers. It also served Delhi and Dehra Dun. It used two Beechcraft 1900D's. Its growth plan envisioned ATR 72 and Bombardier Dash 8-400's to be its main fleet. It was liquidated. It was owned by Indian conglomerate Religare which had done air charter stuff in 2006 also.
